fields.Name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
fields.Ingredients:
2 slices of bread
1 slice of cheese
1 slab of butter
1 slice of ham (optional)
fields.Steps:
1. Prepare the bread, cheese, and ham if you want to make a grilled ham and cheese.
2. Butter the outsides of the bread and place on the grill for 3 minutes.
